description:
ERA Real Estate is thrilled to offer you this unique and easy way to search properties nationwide from the palm of your hand. Use the app’s built-in GPS features to map closest homes and then refine your search by property type, price, bedrooms or distance.  You can also search by address, zip code or even specific property listing numbers.
ERA Mobile Real Estate features:
- Save your search for property updates
- Save favorite properties to view later
- View full-screen photos and detailed listing information
- Send a property to a friend via text or email
- Call an ERA Real Estate agent directly for inquiries or to schedule a home tour
About ERA Real Estate:
In 1971, Jim Jackson founded the company, originally called Electronic Realty Associates, with the vision of utilizing the latest technology – then a fax machine – to provide the highest quality service. ERA Real Estate continues its innovator roll with the release of this nationwide mobile real estate search.
